summary: Saint Pierre and Miquelon is a group of eight small islands in the Atlantic Ocean, close to Canada. It's a part of France, but it governs itself. The islands were once part of a large French territory called New France. People living there are French citizens, and they can vote for France's leader. The islands are near Newfoundland, Canada, and have a total area of about 93 square miles. As of 2016, around 6,000 people live there.
title: Saint Pierre and Miquelon
